Package jmutation.mutation.heuristic

Class HeuristicMutator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmutation.mutation.Mutator
      • jmutation.mutation.heuristic.HeuristicMutator
  • public class HeuristicMutator
extends Mutator
    Given an arbitrary project (maven or gradle) and a region, we shall mutate the region into a compilable project.
